snippet: Facebook's $1 billion acquisition of Instagram is the first time the social-networking titan didn't strike a deal almost entirely for the programming talent of its target.
abstract: Facebook's $1 billion acquisition of Instagram is the first time the social-networking titan didn't strike a deal almost entirely for the programming talent of its target.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Instagram Signals Break in Facebook's Deal-Making Style
